description: Makes in depth study easy. This software doesn't include commercial versions of the bible in english, but does include a very broad number of languages and english versions.

I was very disappointed to discover that the word search was ignoring many instances where words appear. VERY BAD!
summary: Terrible word seach misses a bunch of stuff

description: I recommend this app.
summary: It is a useful application for bible readers

description: Great APP! Has various language fo certain cversions of the bible. Not perfect but a great work in progress.

It is definitely clunky and you can feel it lagging behind the times, but it is a great tool for reading the bible. I love the integration of seeing each words translation as well as being able to drag and drop links between panes when you are doing the devotionals and you want to reference the passage quickly. If you look at the repo they take a lot of care to make sure it is a good tool which helps people understand and read the bible without putting people at risk in countries where this may not be legal to have.

This site is a good reference for the broader ecosystem this is built around as well: http://www.crosswire.org/sword/index.jsp

Thanks for putting this in a snap!
summary: This is a great open source bible app built on the sword engine

description:
I have used eSword on Windows devices, and this seems to be the Linux version. One feature that is really nice is the ability to read side-by-side in the same window different Bible versions, or a commentary that scrolls along with the verses you are reading. Very nice interface and quality.
All of the resources are a little "dated" to some extent since it takes advantage of free and open source material (Bibles, commentaries, etc.). So you wouldn't want to use this for deep seminary research or sermon prep, but it is great for a daily Bible reader and resource. Very clean and fast.
summary: Great Bible app - eSword for Linux

description: This version of Bible Time works good for me. At the time of this writing there are two versions in the snap store, 3.0.0 and 2.11.2-1. I believe that 2.11.2-1 has many user interface issues. If you can choose between the two virsions I suggest getting 3.0.0.
Easy to configure and very accurate.
You can get any version of the Bible you want via this crosswire.org

Very well done great study tool, Would like a few more relevant translations amplified or the voice BUT no complaints very useful, I really like the implementation of strongs numbers and commentaries.. Well Done !!

One of the best out there
Glad it's still supported.
i love reading a bible
nice appppppppp
Can't select Dark Mode in the app. The app won't download from some repositories. I've switched to Flathub version, everything works.

I am no stranger to Bible Software, and this has some great effort put into it. I however cannot use it in it current state it lacks a lot of fundamental aspects in regards to Referencing across other books and maintaining it functionality. The Strongs Reference System doesn't seem to work. This may be alright if your in a pinch, for seriously involved study and research this is not on any level efficient enough to keep up. I do however applaud the effort that has gone into it, but I need a substancial software suite whereby I can count on consistently, fiddling around with trying to find everything required to make this work is counter productive. Please don't judge this software based on my review as it does do well for the simple aspect, however it just does not meet the ability to keep up with the speed and efficiency I require to be productive in what I do.
summary: Still Needs a Lot of Work

description: weitgehend intuitiv bedienbar, bietet vielfältige Möglichkeiten ohne überladen zu sein

Ist man erst einmal eingearbeitet, ist das Programm eine gute Hilfe bei der Bibelrecherche. Suchfunktion bietet vielfältige Einstellmöglichkeit. Die Bezeichnung der Übersetzung ist nicht selbstredend, wäre es möglich diese in ganzen Worten wie "revidierte Elberfelder" zu benennen?

Sehr umfangreich und doch einfach zu Handhaben!
Leicht in der Einarbeitung der Software!
Finde ich einfach nur perfekt!

Es una aplicación que permite descargar muchos modulos gratuitamente para el estudio profundo de la palabra de Dios. Incluye los comentarios de Mathew Henry y Barnes en idioma inglés, entre otros.
